I agree. All this OOC arguing reminded me that I have a message board
ready, made of pure and simple C++ (well, some C too, but I didn't
write that part). Anyways, all I need now are some suggestions for the
coloring. THe colors I need are:

Post background color 1 & 2.
Post text color 1 & 2.
What I should cover the walls of my room (that's the most crucial
one).

Anyways, the post and text colors are like the ones on EZBoard and
stuff. They alternate with every post in the topics. I think those are
the only ones I need. As soon as I get some suggestions, I'll put up
the message board, and then we can discuss Physics on that.

PS. I just fixed my keyboard using nothing but a screwdriver and the
sink, so it might not be working well. If there are any typos, its the
sink's fault.

> (Enough with the OOC arguing.)
